lines.text:
[reading a letter]
I've won something. It's an Irish broom for sweeping meat.

[takes the letter and reads it]
Waldo, you just won the Irish Sweepstakes!
I don't want that. I want the kind of woman who can pound in nails with her bare fists, and carry me to bed when I've fallen asleep in my E-Z chair.
Hern, do you want a wife, or a gorilla?
Do you have my favorite song, "The Burping Chili Man"? It's by a band called Dave and the Chili-Burpers.
OK, here's a game called One Potato Two. 'One potato, two potato, three potato four. Five potato, six potato, seven potato or...thirteen tomatoes, one potato sitting by my bathroom door...'
